code: import{useState}from"react";import topicController from'../../../../controllers/TOPIC-controller';import InputWithError from'../../../../animations/input-error-field';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const optionsOfWhatHappend=await topicController.getListOfWhatHappend();const ProblemEnter=_ref=>{let{TOPIC,error}=_ref;const[localProblem,setLocalProblem]=useState("");const inputRadioCheck=e=>{TOPIC.problem(e.value);};const isChecked=index=>{if(optionsOfWhatHappend.indexOf(TOPIC.problem)===index){return true;}else{return false;}};const isCheckedUserInput=()=>{if(TOPIC.problem===""||optionsOfWhatHappend.includes(TOPIC.problem)){return false;}else{return true;}};const setValue=()=>{if(optionsOfWhatHappend.includes(TOPIC.problem)){return"";}else{return TOPIC.problem;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase-annotation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"4/9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u0427\u0442\u043E \u0441\u043B\u0443\u0447\u0438\u043B\u043E\u0441\u044C?"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"options-input",onChange:e=>inputRadioCheck(e.target),children:[optionsOfWhatHappend.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",value:item,name:"check",checked:isChecked(index)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item})]},index);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",value:localProblem,name:"check",checked:isCheckedUserInput()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputWithError,{placeholder:"Ваш вариант",value:setValue(),setValue:setLocalProblem,error:error})]})]})]});};export default ProblemEnter;
